name: Lost Soul (IvyHatsu)
description:
It seems you are not a human anymore, but a soul in a dark world. You do not know why, and your memory seems to have been erased. The only thing you want to do is keep moving forward until the end to seek some answers. 

Remember, it will not be easy, you are not alone: there will be creatures trying that you do not reach the end.

This is a simple game with one level to try out some game mechanics, AI, etc, so expect bugs and some "unfinished" stuff.

A game by Alpaca Games, developed with Unity.

Input Controls:

- Movement: ASD keys

- Jump: Space key

- Fire: F or left-click mouse
